TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowServiceHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 在托管宿主环境中提供 的实例的工厂，在此环境中为响应传入消息而动态创建宿主实例。

span.span: Factory that provides instances of in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持动态激活的托管宿主环境包括 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 和 Windows 进程激活服务 (WAS)。The managed hosting environments that support dynamic activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Service (WAS). 如果已实现 的自定义派生，还应考虑实现派生自 类的工厂。If you have implemented a custom derivative of , consider also implementing a factory that derives from the class. 如果已实现 的自定义派生，还应考虑实现可直接从 派生工厂的工厂。If you have implemented a custom derivative of instead, then consider also implementing a factory that derives your factory from directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase CreateServiceHost (string constructorString, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase CreateServiceHost(string constructorString, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (constructorString As String, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHostBase
public: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHostBase ^ CreateServiceHost(System::String ^ constructorString, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

param.name: constructorString
param.span: 定义工作流服务的工作流标记文件的文件名或工作流服务类型的类型名。

span.span: The file name of the workflow markup file that defines the workflow service or the type name of the workflow service type.

param.name: baseAddresses
param.span: 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

span.span: An array of type that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

summary.span: 从字符串创建 ，该字符串包含工作流标记文件的文件名或工作流服务类型的类型名和指定的服务基址。

span.span: Creates a from a string that contains either the file name of the workflow markup file or the type name of the workflow service type and the base address of the service specified.

returns.span: 与工作流服务关联的 对象。

span.span: A object associated with the workflow service.

returns.span: 默认实现返回一个具有指定基址的 对象。

span.span: The default implementation returns a object with the specified base addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `constructorString` 参数可以是一个完全限定的工作流类型名，也可以是在 指令所在的 .svc 文件中声明的工作流定义文件的相对文件路径。The `constructorString` argument could be either a fully qualified workflow type name or it could be the relative file path of the workflow definition file declared in the .svc file in which directives are placed. > [!NOTE] > 若要将规则定义与工作流定义关联，请将规则定义文件命名为与工作流定义文件相同的名称并且扩展名为 .rules，然后将其放在与工作流定义文件相同的目录中。To associate a rule definition with a workflow definition, name the rule definition file the same name as the workflow definition file with a .rules extension and place it in same directory as the workflow definition file. 例如，规则定义文件 CalculatorServiceWorkflow.rules 必须与 CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml 位于同一目录中。For example, the rules definition file CalculatorServiceWorkflow.rules must be in the same directory as CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml. ## Examples 下面的示例为对工作流服务 CalculatorServiceWorkflow 的基于类型的引用。The following is an example of a type-based reference to the workflow service CalculatorServiceWorkflow. ``` <%@ServiceHost language=c# Debug="true" Factory="System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" Service="CalculatorServiceWorkflow" %> ``` 下面的示例为引用工作流服务 CalculatorServiceWorkflow 的工作流定义文件。The following is an example of a workflow definition file reference to the workflow service CalculatorServiceWorkflow. ``` <%@ServiceHost language=c# Debug="true" Factory="System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" Service="CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml" %> ```
